import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import './mainAppStyle.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import UserContext from '../context/user/userContext'; function MainApp() { const userContext = useContext(UserContext); useEffect(() => { userContext.loadUser(); // load the user currently logged in whenever we hit main app }); return (

); } export default MainApp;
